scripts.build-mac: rm -rf dist/RD-darwin-x64 && electron-packager . RD --out=dist --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.37.6 --ignore=dist/RD* && asar pack dist/RD-darwin-x64/RD.app/Contents/Resources/app dist/RD-darwin-x64/RD.app/Contents/Resources/app.asar && rm -rf dist/RD-darwin-x64/RD.app/Contents/Resources/app
scripts.build-win: rm -rf dist/RD-win32-ia32 && electron-packager . RD --out=dist --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=0.37.6 --ignore=dist/RD* && asar pack dist/RD-win32-ia32/resources/app dist/RD-win32-ia32/resources/app.asar && rm -rf dist/RD-win32-ia32/resources/app
